title: [Feat]: With `trayIconEnabled` set to `false` context menu doesn't show
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Right-clicking the misspelled word for example just selects it instead of showing the context menu.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ba63ffa1-624b-4d1f-984c-3c952303602c)

### What package are you using?

aur

### Version

2.0.8

### Reproduction steps

Config:

```json
{
  "trayIconEnabled": false
}
```

### Expected Behavior

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e8d60356-ed0f-4cb4-8264-e9ff6e5d9ea4)
